channel.title: Anatomy essay questions
channel.description:
I've been going nuts over these the last few hours "
- Contrast how positive and negative feedback control loops are used to maintain homeostasis. Give examples.
- Explain the relationship between the process of mitosis and the development of cancer. Include the role of oncogenes the process of metastasis.
- Describe how bone growth occurs. Include a discussion on the epiphyseal plate.
- Explain how short and long term memory work. How does Alzeimer's disease affect memory?
I would really appreciate it if I could get some help with these.

item.title: Anatomy essay questions
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I doubt anyone, except Greeny (maybe) can answer these questions for you.

You probably have a book, and that is your source of answers.

Read full topic
